room_title: Escape room "Red Beard's Revenge" by Break Out Myrtle Beach in Myrtle Beach
room_address: 314 Main St North Myrtle Beach, SC 29582
room_description: You'll need to work together to get past the traps and tricks that Black Beard and his men have strategically placed to protect it. You already have the map but you won't find the spot marked X if you miss any steps or clues along the way. Find the treasure and escape before Black Beard's ship returns or you and your crew will walk the plank.
